page.text: de Vence MAGAZINE GUIDE TO VENCE Delicatessen QUICKGUIDE

Introduction No matter what type of gourmet indulgence or gift you would like to buy in Vence, you will find it in a shop here. This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment. To download the newest version of our Magazine click on this icon. Delicatessen Click here to return to Vence Magazine QUICKGUIDE

Whatever wine for every occasion... We will advice you on which wine to chose from french to foreign and in all price ranges. 40 Avenue Marcelin Marurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 59 83 70 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00.????? Vinea Terra 36 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps Adresse 36 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France

0830h00-19h00. Open after 19h00 on reservation. Fleurs de la Passion e, France - Google Maps Adresse 83 Avenue Victor Tuby 06140 Vence, France 9/17/13 6:51 AM At the foot of the Baou, our team of florists will welcome you in the midst of floral creations and various plants. We will alway do our best to satisfy you. So, do not hesitate... 83, Avenue Victor Tuby - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 24 06 68

Léonidas, Place du Grand Jardin, Vence, France - Google Maps Léonidas, à proximité de Place du Grand Jardin, 06140 Vence, France A. Léonidas 22 Place du Grand Jardin, 06140 Vence, France ​ +33 4 93 24 63 03 ​ Since his very first creations, Leonidas’ recipe for success is based on the virtue of impeccable freshness. Today, Leoni- das makes more than 100 varieties of Belgian chocolates of the highest quality and freshness – always using chocolate made of 100% pure cocoa butter. This summer we also opened a café !!! 22 Place du Grand Jardin - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 24 63 03 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Leonidas

9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Pâtisserie Palanque A. Pâtisserie Palanque et Fils SARL 37 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France ​ +33 4 93 58 02 24 ​ B. Morellini Sarl 37 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France ​ +33 4 93 24 29 85 ​ 37 avenue Marcelin Maurel - à proximité de Vence, Alpes-Maritimes, Provence-Alpes- Côte d'Azur, France Palanque pastry shop and its team welcome you in their sweet paradise, where three generations have perpetuated the good taste of specialities, such as the famous ‘craquelin vençois’. 37 avenue Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 58 02 24 E-Mail: lecraquelin@patisseriepalanque.fr www. patisseriepalanque.com

Pâtisserie Debenais Give a real treat to your tastebuds with homemade flower flavoured chocolates. Yield to temptation for an “Emma” home speciality. English-style wedding cakes; sugared almonds. 36 Avenue Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 04 14 E-Mail: debenais@debenais.fr 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. 36 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps Adresse 36 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France 9/17/13 6:57 AM

08h00-13h00/16h00-19h00. Sunday 08h00-13h00. Monday closed. La Galinette Vençoise Adresse 8 Rue du Marché 06140 Vence, France Specialist in roasted chicken and a variety of frilled meats. Catering on request. Come and see us directly or order by phone. 9 Rue du Marché - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 12 60 E-Mail: giseledinallo@hotmail.fr

Established for over 30 years, we are happy to welcome you and encourage you to taste our traditional regional specialities: fresh pasta, cooked dishes, homemade sauces. 13 ave Marcellin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 09 80 37 19 44 E-Mail: mc-perrin@fr.oleane.com Le Raviolie Perrin 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. 12 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps 9/ Adresse 12 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France

0830h00-19h00. Open after 19h00 on reservation. Leccadito Adresse 8 Rue du Marché 06140 Vence, France “Leccadito from “lecca”, to lick and “dito “, fingers refers to the quality and taste of the italian products sold here: italian pork butchery such as salame, bressaola, culaccia, smoked pancetta, copa di Parma. You’ll also find famous italian cheeses and of course pasta and a good choice of famous italian wines. “ 10 Rue du Marché - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)9 82 29 81 18 E-Mail: leccadito.vence@gmail.com

The Bouton d’Or is at your service to flower your emotions throughout your lifetime. A style adapted to any event. 20 Avenue Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 30 16 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Bouton d’Or Adresse 25 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France

07h30-13h00. Monday closed. Poissonnerie des Halles A. Hôtel Spa & Restaurant Cantemerle 258, chemin Cantemerle, 06140 Vence ​ 04 93 58 08 18 ​ 3 avis €€€ Prix convertis selon le taux de change actuel - Clause de non- responsabilité Franck Schweninger is proud to be ‘Poissonnerie des Halles ‘ Specialising in local Mediterranean fish caught daily on small traditional fishing boats, especially Swordfish!!! Place Surian - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 24 28 96 E-Mail: info@poissonneriedeshalles.eu www. poissonneriedeshalles.eu 258 chemin cantemerle, vence, france

Au Coeur des Épices We offer two addresses where you can discover 1000 fla- vours; precious spices, mixes and homemade preparations; salts from all around the world; rare peppers; pimentos; exceptional teas and herbal infusions; flavoured sugars; vanillas; Peugeot pepper mills; extraordinary balsamic vin- egars; original Marseille soaps made in the family factory. 1 Rue de l’Hotel de Ville - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 30 84 E-Mail: aucoeurdesepices@free.fr 1 Rue de l'Hôtel de ville, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps 9/17/13 7:03 A 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Adresse 1 Rue de l'Hôtel de ville 1 Rue de l'Hôtel de ville 06140 Vence, France

08h00 - 13h00/ 16h00 - 20h00. Sunday/Monday :08h00 - 13h00. Wednesday closed. Art et Saveurs 36 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps Adresse 36 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France 9/17/13 6:57 AM Dans leur magasin ouvert depuis Avril 2003, Claudine et Christophe Garello vous proposeront des produits, et une cuisine du cœur, d’origine niçoise et italienne, dont les maîtres mots sont “La saveur et la qualité” ! 31, ave Marcellin Maurel- 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 33 24 E-Mail: traiteur.azureen@hotmail.fr www. artetsaveurs.com

Entre Mes Chocolats Patrice Arbona prepares chocolates and candies in his shop while you watch. Enjoy a cup of coffee while attending a demonstration and tasting. Advance booking required. 12 Avenue Marcelin Marurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)9 81 82 34 59 12 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Adresse 12 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France

0830h00-19h00. Le Poivre d’Âne Adresse 8 Rue du Marché 06140 Vence, France Established in Vence for 36 years, the cheese and wine experts of “Au Poivre d’Âne” welcome you with a smile. While in Vence, pop in to discover our exceptional wines and vast choice cheeses... 12 Rue du Marché - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 04 25

La Boucherie Vençoise A small exclusive butcher shop that does not fail to please – Boucherie Vencoise, in the quaint market street. David Fleuriel worked at Maximin and Louis XV in Monaco. He sells an excellent selection of the finest beef, veal, lamb, pork, rabbit, chicken etc chosen from renowned award-winning areas in France. 14 Rue du Marché - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)9 81 82 34 59 08h30-13h00/15h30-19h00. Adresse 8 Rue du Marché 06140 Vence, France

0830h00-19h00. Open after ?????? Boucherie des Halles Adresse 22 Place Clemenceau 06140 Vence, France Limousin red label beef; farm raised lamb from the “Pays d’Oc”; South West grain-fed farmed pork; high quality meat and sausages; and homemade tomato stuffing. Place Clémenceau - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 17 05

You are always sure to find the gift you require, may it be a formal gift for a specific occasion, a simple thoughtful treat for a friend, or simply a little indulgence for yourself. 44-46 Avenue Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 59 97 61 E-Mail: jeffdebruges.vence@hotmail.fr www.jeff-de-bruges.com Jeff de Bruges 44-46 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps 9/17/13 6:45 AM Adresse 46 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France

All about the icons Shopping No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. Hotels and Other Accomodation If you are searching for superior comfort or a budget “bed and breakfast” you will find an accomodation to suit you here. Restaurants FASHION HOTELS SOUVENIRS DELICATESSEN GUEST HOUSES CAMPING Vence’s restaurants cater for every taste and pocket - from inexpensive “plat du jour” of local produce to exotic flavours from other lands or gourmet adventures. Cafes Vence’s many cafes are ideal places to relax and watch the world go by, to meet and chat to residents or other tourists, or plan your next excursion. Real Estate Agents See how real people live on the Côte d’Azur by visiting sales properties with a choice of Real Estate Agents. Perhaps your visit will prove a good financial investment. Services Banks, pharmacies, and if you can’t find what you’re looking for, it is probably listed here. Galleries SERVICES FINANCE TAKE-AWAY The “City of Arts” is home to many galleries. Each has its own theme, special artist or style of work. Some are hidden in interesting untravelled corners of the city. Beauty Whether tempted to try a new look or merely smartening up for a special evening out, Vence’s beauty parlours and hairdressers are at your service. Places Museums, Parks, Miscellaneous sites worth seeing...

Introduction No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. But do not ignore the many other small boutiques selling everything from antiques, through to high fashion clothing. This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment.
